allData.occupation: Global Business Management Graduate | Working Student in Economics @TUM Supporting Data-Driven & Innovative Research

positions.title: Assistant at TUM Chair of Economic
positions.description:
In my role as a Working Student Assistant at the TUM Chair of Economics, I provide broad-based support across various tasks. 

My key contributions include:
• Economic Research: Conducting thorough economic literature research to lay a strong foundation for successful projects.
• Project Support: Assisting with supplementary tasks to ensure an efficient workflow throughout all stages of the project. 
• Data Analytics: Creating impactful presentations, reports, and visuals while analyzing and interpreting data using statistical software.
• Flexible and Reliable Support: Serving as a dependable team resource, readily adapting to changing tasks and challenges, and ensuring support at critical moments.

In my position, I have developed strong expertise in economic research and analysis. Most importantly, I have demonstrated my ability to thrive in both familiar and unfamiliar tasks while continuously consolidating and expanding my skill set. I deeply value the collaborative environment, mutual respect, and personal responsibility that I experience in my role, which fosters both professional support and personal confidence.

positions.title: Fitness Studio Operations Associate | Client Relation, Sales, & Training Support
positions.description:
For 3+ years, I managed customer service and operational tasks at Level20 Fitness to support a well-functioning studio environment. Working 15 hours per week, I handled diverse responsibilities, including:
• Customer Relations: Delivered high-quality service while providing tailored consulting on nutrition  and training, ensuring each client’s success in achieving personal goals.
• Sales and Inventory: Handled in-studio sales and the effective management of inventory.
• Customer Acquisition: Engaged with potential members and successfully secured new memberships. 
•Operational Support: Managed key financial and operational tasks, ensuring accuracy, and efficiency in daily studio operations.

In my role, I particularly developed strong skills in customer service and personalized client consulting. Most importantly, I built a strong ability to ensure seamless daily operations by effectively coordinating multiple tasks across finance, customer care, inventory management, and human resources

certifications.name: Cambridge English Certificate in Advanced English (CAE)

allData.headline: Global Business Management Graduate | Working Student in Economics @TUM Supporting Data-Driven & Innovative Research
allData.summary:
Global Business Management Graduate @University of Augsburg with a strong affinity for strategic planning and intercultural communication | Working at the TUM Chair of Economics for 1+ year, supporting several of their innovative research projects

Some examples of my accomplishments include:
• Graduating in the top 5% of my Bachelor's degree, showcasing commitment to excellence 
• Completing two exchange semesters at the @UIC, enhancing my global perspective
• Highly fluent in English and Spanish, with foundational knowledge in Catalan and French
• Enthusiastic coffee lover with proficient skills after completing a barista course

I am excited about opportunities to enhance my skills while working with like-minded and motivated individuals. I strive to connect with people from all over the world, believing in the importance of effective communication.
